dict.acceptation: 赚，赚得；获得；挣得；使得到；

sent.orig: So preparation and royal combination operation, can earn how to much earn.
sent.trans: 所以准备与盛大联合运营，能挣多少挣多少。

sent.orig: It takes many many clicks to earn $ dollars.
sent.trans: 它需要许多次点击才能赚到美元。

sent.orig: Now, these people, already quite poor, have no way to earn money.
sent.trans: 现在，这些本来就贫穷的人完全没有了赚钱的法子。

sent.orig: Work hard, earn more and live a good life.
sent.trans: 好好努力，多多赚钱，好好生活！

sent.orig: I wonder how much interest can I earn from a current account.
sent.trans: 我想知道支票户口可赚取多少利息。
